DES DECRYPTION PROCESS
======================

Original ciphertext (64 bits): 1101101000000010110011100011101010001001111011001010110000111011

Step 1: Apply Initial Permutation (IP)
After IP: 0010010110001001011001001001000001110101111010001111110110001111

R0: 01110101111010001111110110001111
